roleset.name: exchange

role.descr: other item in exchange, price, or premium, traded for or at

roles.note: No examples of args 2 or 4 found with this noun. See other trade entries for examples.

example.name: Within LVC, args 0 & 1
example.text: Marketers believe most Americans won't make the convenience trade-off ... .

example.name: With Arg3
example.text: This didn't give Americans much confidence that their trade-off of Fourth Amendment freedoms for a little extra safety is a good deal.

example.name: Arg 3 only
example.text: The trade-off with bonds then is more security for less return on your investment.
example.note: This seems to be a common usage with "trade-off". I see the "with" phrase as the thing potentially being traded for: trading off something else in exchange for bonds in this case.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry trade.01; maps to VN class exchange-13.6-1. Framed by Claire.
